member_organisations:
Danish Holding comprised of multiple Romanian subsidiaries, out of which: 
Premium Porc SRL 
Premium Porc Feed SRL 
Premium Porc Negreni SRL 
Degaro SRL 
Consinterfin SRL 
Olsuin SRL 
Premium Porc Sibiu SRL 
Premium Vet Depot SRL 
Agro Investments Moldova SRL
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Business and Industry, Environment, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: Legislation that regulates the professional pig production industry, meat production industry, trading of live animals and meat products, disease control and management.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Premium Porc Group is a Danish holding with vertically integrated activities in agribusiness, covering cereal, feed and pig production. 
Main area of expertise: development and management of large scale pig production units, using Danish expertise, technology and genetics, while applying a tested and improved business model.
